analysis.description:
VANMToken.incentivisingAddress (/unique_chucks/17/0x6ad25194cd7b966c05eb2bec7f6be76639f98172.sol#149) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- constructor (/unique_chucks/17/0x6ad25194cd7b966c05eb2bec7f6be76639f98172.sol#194-231)
	- transferFromIncentivising (/unique_chucks/17/0x6ad25194cd7b966c05eb2bec7f6be76639f98172.sol#320-330)
	- checkIncentivisingBalance (/unique_chucks/17/0x6ad25194cd7b966c05eb2bec7f6be76639f98172.sol#365-367)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/17/0x6ad25194cd7b966c05eb2bec7f6be76639f98172.sol:
	Contract VANMToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/17/0x6ad25194cd7b966c05eb2bec7f6be76639f98172.sol#395-397)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in VANMCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0x6ad25194cd7b966c05eb2bec7f6be76639f98172.sol#509-515):
	External calls:
	- tokens = weiAmount * getCrowdsaleRate() (/unique_chucks/17/0x6ad25194cd7b966c05eb2bec7f6be76639f98172.sol#510-512)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/17/0x6ad25194cd7b966c05eb2bec7f6be76639f98172.sol#512)

VANMCrowdsale.crowdsaleHasClosed (/unique_chucks/17/0x6ad25194cd7b966c05eb2bec7f6be76639f98172.sol#500-502) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > crowdsaleEndsAt (/unique_chucks/17/0x6ad25194cd7b966c05eb2bec7f6be76639f98172.sol#501-502)
